ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Portin'
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. I went to Kunark with my lvl 5 Rogue. I completely stripped her of anything of value and went running. Upon getting there I asked if anyone wanted to
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. I went to Kunark with my lvl 5 Rogue. I completely stripped her of
anything of value and went running. Upon getting there I asked if anyone
wanted to challenge me to a duel. No takers. Go figure. ;-D
I amused a few people by announcing my level and my intention to wipe out
all the mobs in the zone.
Oh, has anyone else seen the ogre in FV that calls people "Kid" when talking
to them?
luv,
-Su

> You can go to a dungeon, any dungeon in Kunark, then port to Emerald
Jungle
> but thats not a real safe place for lower lvls. Skyfire, but not a great
> place either with some luck and invis you could get to overthere faster.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2001 2:09 PM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [EverQuest] Portin'
>
>
> Speaking of porting...how can I get a port to Kunark?
>
> Not Dreadlands...but closer to Cabilis
> and without taking the barrel barge?
>
> is there anywhere else that will get me into Kunark besides one of the
boats
> or the DL port...please
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: ZeonChar [SMTP:ZeonChar@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 7:21 AM
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Druid flying solo, mostly.
> >
> > LOL, I tried that once as a newbie. Boy was I dumb! But there is a Druid

> >
> >
> > ~Daikun
> > Shadow Knight and Guardian of Innoruuk
